Note: This version of the app is limited to storing 3 waypoints and 40 tracklog points. The paid version does not have these limits.

Features:

* View your current location in UTM or Lat/Lon formats.
* Record and/or manually enter waypoints.
* Goto a waypoint.
* Record a track log.
* Show your current location, waypoints and tracklogs on a map.
* Export waypoints and tracklogs to a KML file for viewing in Google Earth, or to a GPX file.
* Import KML or GPX files and view in the app.
* Email your current location to a friend.
* Odometer to keep track of how far you've gone.
* Magnetic compass.
* Supports both metric and US/imperial units.
* Supports datums WGS84, GDA94, AGD66 and AGD84. (Use WGS84 for NAD83)
* Can show your current location as an MGRS grid ref (WGS84 only).
* Optional walk timer.

Additional features only available in the paid version include:
* Entry of parameters for a custom datum (e.g. ED50, SAD69, OSGB36, etc)
* Elevation profile.
* Compute sun rise and set times.
* Unlimited waypoints and tracklog points.

HomeCourt uses the camera on your device to track your performance in real-time, everything from your jump shot to your crossover. In-depth data and analytics help you break down every session. HomeCourt calculates metrics like shooting percentage, accuracy, release time, dribble speed, vertical jump and more. You can even use Apple Watch to track your heart rate and save your data to HealthKit. 

ENGAGE IN FUN, INTERACTIVE DRILLS
Using HomeCourt is less like training and more like a video game. The immersive live-action experience is powered by AR (augmented reality), with virtual targets, audio cues, bonus levels, points and badges—it’s like you’re inside the game. Now practicing skills is engaging, not boring, so you’ll stick to it and improve more. 

LEARN FROM THE PROS
HomeCourt is an official partner of the NBA and provides access to the expertise of the most elite players in the game today. Train with interactive drills and instruction from NBA and WNBA athletes. Learn their moves and even compete against them in interactive challenges. 

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS
Don’t workout alone, compete virtually with your friends, family, and teammates. You can join a virtual Team on HomeCourt, or create your own Team for free. You can also challenge a friend or teammate to any HomeCourt activity with a time-shifted “Battle Mode” that matches you up head-to-head. As you compete in Battles, you collect trophies, badges, and coins, just like you would in a video game. Earn rewards and level up together.

SHOWCASE YOUR SKILLS
Engage in unique showcase activities and even get discovered directly by the NBA. Participants who opt-in to NBA Global Scout are eligible to receive invitations to select NBA tryouts, camps, tournaments, and showcases. As you build your profile on HomeCourt, you can also share your progress with individual coaches and scouts.

--
SET UP
HomeCourt is ready to use everywhere you bring your iPhone or iPad. No special basketballs, uncomfortable sensors, or expensive equipment is required. Just set up your phone with a clear view of the court and starting training and competing through HomeCourt.

PRICING

• HomeCourt Plus: Access your full workout history, get complete skill ratings, join the members-only training club, request feedback from HomeCourt pro trainers, participate in HomeCourt Global Camp, and create up to 4 user profiles.

Bring modern firearm training into the comfort of your home! Dry fire with a laser cartridge is the safest and most effective way to learn or coach the proper firearm handling and safety, master fundamentals, and develop and maintain exceptional shooting skills. 

Combine the LASERHIT mobile app with the unique LASERHIT HD laser cartridge to get an industrial-grade precise instrument. Go beyond the fundamentals to improve your results with the phenomenal accuracy of the LaserHIT system.

The LASERHIT app, inspired by shooting instructors and military veterans, is a true shooting skills builder for all ages and at all expertise levels, from first-time users to proficient sharpshooters.

And last but not least, save tons of money on ammunition and free your time for a range visit and firearm cleaning. LaserHIT dry fire system put your training together effectively and inexpensively to shoot like the Pros!

FREE TARGET PRACTICE (Free)
The most straightforward and realistic substitution of the shooting practice at the range. Exercise with LaserHIT targets, your multiple targets, or the actual objects. Track the number of hits, overlapped hits, and time for each session. Use the driven by augmented reality built-in Reload Area feature to reset your practice right from the firing line.

BLACK STEEL PRACTICE (Free)
The most realistic substitution to shooting at steel plates. Use paper targets of any size and shape as long as it's black or dark colored. Download the targets from the LASERHIT website, or use your own. When the laser hits the target, it will turn red with a realistic steel sound. The app will count targets-down hits, overlapped hits, and total hits.

TOP SCORE PRACTICE (In-app)
Practice with the proprietary LASERHIT targets to improve the five fundamentals of shooting: aiming, breath control, hold control, trigger control, and follow-through. Top Score is the best solution to practice accuracy. See the exact scores and grouping in real-time. Listen to numeric and directional announcements of your results.

QUICK HIT PRACTICE (In-app)
Practice with the proprietary LASERHIT targets to improve the speed and reliable accuracy of various concealed draws. Work on a draw from concealment, draw from a holster, ready-up, or transitional drills with LASERHIT precision. Track visually and audibly your Time and Score for single or multiple hits. Customize the "commence firing" delays, hit size, and timeout. 

WHY IS THE LASERHIT TARGET REQUIRED FOR SOME PRACTICES?
The app will require using the proprietary LaserHIT Targets to assure precise scoring. LASERHIT targets supports the highest quality and rapid response to timing, accuracy, and hit placement. All targets are available for free download or purchase on the LASERHIT website.

LASERHIT UNIQUENESS:
LASERHIT app is compatible with all common laser training cartridges on the market: any type, such as HD or Generic, or any laser color, such as red, green, or blue.
LaserHIT is compatible and supports multiple training options:
- Real firearm with LaserHIT HD laser training cartridge instead of live rounds;
- Real firearm with any basic laser training cartridges instead of live rounds;
- Real firearm with barrel replacement CO2 recoil system and built-in laser;
- Replica of a firearm with or without blowback action with laser built-in;

SPECIAL: 
- There is a unique option to set up your Dry Fire training with the large screen TV to emphasize the visibility and audibility of the training results in real time. Use the Apple TV or LaserHIT adapter to mirror your iPhone or iPad to your TV while running your training with LASERHIT software.

- Incredibly immersive experience.
